Gardak Horn was a shield dwarf mage who served as the Mage Defender of the Wyrms Rock fortress in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Circa , the old commander of Wyrms Rock, Skorpin Crane, had passed away in his sleep. With Ulder Ravengard in Elturel and unable to appoint a replacement, Gardak assumed responsibility, using his personal homunculus to spy upon the garrison, for which his troops hated him.
